intro: ^Mystia was working on some song lyrics in her Izakaya when tengu reporter Aya appears.
^Hey Mystia I got a letter for you.
^She handed the sparrow the letter who opens and read it.

^Dear Mystia, As you know I am throwing a party for the amazing birds of Gensokyo. As a fellow Avian I want to invite you and have you provide for the party. Please bring your Izakaya to the top of Youkai Mountain on the double. Signed Megumu.
^Yes, But I heard the fairies are  pretty aggressive this time of year and I’m not exactly fast pushing this thing
^How about I help you, I also have to give other invite to the birds along the way so we can travel with all of them
^I will be glad lets get going
^The two travel off to Youkai Mountain
